author: Connie
text: Sometimes I can get tired of being the nice guy. You get mad one time and it’s the end of the world and you’re actually just a mean person in disguise… you can’t imagine how frustrating it is to not be listened to coz you’re expected to be the bigger person first all the time.

author: Connie
text: No one’s an enemy to me, even if they leave, until they start acting like I did everything to deserve any mistreatment without communicating any of it to me. That’s honestly one of the most annoying things to me.

author: Connie
text: Yo literally how I feel every time https://t.co/ZNN0Na0YHP

author: Connie
text: Significantly cutting down social media and caffeine, and increasing learning time, me time, and friends time. ADHD makes me struggle with dopamine, but I’m sick of not fighting back anymore. Sometimes you can’t choose what you are, but you can choose how you act.

author: Connie
text: Would you rather be at peace with the world but in war with yourself, or at war with the world but in peace with yourself?

author: Connie
text: It do get to you sometimes bro. Especially when the ones saying these are people who identify as part of your circle. Like damn imagine getting beaten down by Random’s I don’t care about and people I care about. The randoms part is hard already. https://t.co/YDyaKlnnKV

author: Connie
text: Making an effort and doing what you’re told is not the same thing.

author: Connie
text: Don’t leave today’s pages blank because you’re too busy obsessing over your past pages.

author: Connie
text: A man gave an envelope to a random person. Inside was $50 and a note that said “idk what you’re going through, but today’s a fresh start”. After thinking, the receiver gave the $50 to a homeless man. Coz he knew the 1st guy wasn’t giving out money, he was spreading happiness.

author: Connie
text: 30 the new 20! https://t.co/7Wstfo5kA8

author: Connie
text: In nature, everything has its purposes, strengths and weaknesses. One is not better than the other but all is valuable and useful for the ecosystem. The only difference with humans is judgment and fitting in with ideals. Don’t be something you’re not, just be you. 😊

author: Connie
text: What if I told you that your quest to validate your worthiness is actually the thing that is preventing you from being you and finding the people that truly like you

author: Connie
text: I’ve come to realize that the best people to trust aren’t the ones that try to make you believe they would never do you wrong, but the ones that admit their mistakes when they do

author: Connie
text: Can’t wait til we’re at a time when we all just consider everyone humans https://t.co/U8u2gtuTG4

author: Connie
text: I told a friend sometimes I think I need to have more status/“power” to make a real positive impact on the world. And he said “bro hitler will be more famous than 10 of you will ever be, and the lady at the homeless food drive would have made infinitely more impact than him”

author: Connie
text: You aren’t wrong for not allowing your energy to be available for “good enough”.

author: Connie
text: You’re already going to die. Memento Mori. So why you wasting your time dying before it’s time

author: Connie
text: Learning there’s a big difference between people pleasing/accommodating and being flexible

author: Connie
text: Grinding for respect, not clout. I support and respect those who want that. But I personally don’t feel fulfilled from clout. I wanna be a better human being for the world. That’s the main goal.

author: Connie
text: They nonstop poke the good people and then cancel them for their reaction. Like “see told y’all they weren’t good people”. Naw. It’s called a limit. Every one has one.

author: Connie
text: Sweet words mean nothing to me. Meaning them means everything.

author: Connie
text: Let people be them, not hope they fill out what you hope to think of them.

author: Connie
text: But that’s what makes everything meaningful ☺️ https://t.co/miD9rrLXor

author: Connie
text: Imagine refusing to listen to understand me and then getting mad when I give off the same energy afterwards. I didn’t do it out of retaliation. I just see how it’s gonna be.

author: Connie
text: Ya that’s only for the wifey now 😂 https://t.co/OKuMgmS91L

author: Connie
text: Real strength is letting people lose you instead of begging them to choose you, no matter how much you love them

author: Connie
text: I swear some people so much more embarrassed about their accidental wrongs. Like that should be the easiest to apologize for. “My bad I didn’t mean to”. Mega easy. But then they be so proud of doing the wrong thing with intention on some “looking out for myself” stuff.

author: Connie
text: Some cages look like mansions

author: Connie
text: People like “you’re just ungrateful, your parents just want you to have a good life”. Listen. Wanting me to be a doctor/lawyer because that’s good for my life is great, but stunting any progress I had for anything else and threatening to pull support if I didn’t follow? Naw chief

author: Connie
text: Is there really true love without respect? https://t.co/43tStWKCRD

author: Connie
text: Society determines kindness as what you can do for people. I think that’s bullshit. Kindness is how you are to people. Service and Submission are not the same. I’m gonna embody that fully. Killing my people pleasing and making me one body. https://t.co/1iV5f8buh5

author: Connie
text: Just coz you don’t like yourself, doesn’t mean that the people who do are perfect. Stop expecting perfection from people just because you think you’re not good enough yourself on some “they’re better than me, they should be able” stuff. Naw. They have difficulties too.

author: Connie
text: Self care is overcoming as much as it is finding your peace. https://t.co/7wd4tsYgXp

author: Connie
text: I’m a healer forced to play protector. And honestly it’s really hard having to be tough when your thoughts are “too nice”. But hey one of these days, imma turn into a paladin. I’m just sucking at it terribly at the moment…

author: Connie
text: Stop leaving the hard work part out when you tell your kids they can achieve anything.

author: Connie
text: If life is measured by happiness, why are we wasting it attaining things that make other people happy with us and not things that make us happy with ourselves.

author: Connie
text: My vibe on this app has been very explorative, but my tone was def judgmental. Which I am 100% not. I personally don’t know how to handle when someone makes you out to be toxic for how you felt when they hurt you. I dealt with that all my life. But I’m still wrong and I’ll grow.

author: Connie
text: Curse of loving the light in people, makes your learn this late. But life is never black or white. Go wherever makes you feel loved. https://t.co/UOzdfM2Ouc
